entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `artist` TEXT NOT NULL, `duration_millis` INTEGER NOT NULL, `album_art_uri` TEXT, `file_path` TEXT NOT NULL, `size_bytes` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))

indices.name: index_songs_file_path
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_songs_file_path` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`file_path`)

indices.name: index_songs_title
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_songs_title` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`title`)

indices.name: index_songs_artist
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_songs_artist` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`artist`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
